LearningAchievementConfig.name: LearningAchievementConfig
LearningAchievementConfig.description: Represents the mapping details between a Learning Achievement type and a Learning Achievement record type.

Description.description: The description of the Learning Achievement Configuration record.

DeveloperName.description: The API name of the Learning Achievement Configuration record.

IconName.description: The icon for the Learning Achievement type that is shown on the Learning Program Builder.

Language.description: The supported language for the learning achievement configuration.

LearningAchievementType.description: Specifies the type of Learning Achievement.

LearningAchvRecordTypeId.description: The record type that's associated with the Learning Achievement type.

MasterLabel.description: The name of the Learning Achievement type.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix of the Learning Achievement Configuration record.
